renewed-contributions.title: Toots and Casper
renewed-contributions.note: Listed as work for hire by Jimmy Murphy as an employee of King Features Syndicate.  King Features is the author for copyright purposes.

additional-note: Some images from the New York American were renewed separately in the Artwork section, rather than in the Contributions to Periodicals section.  The first such image with an active copyright is by Jimmy Murphy as an employee of King Features Syndicate, and is titled 'Toots & Casper. Isn't it odd.'.  It ran in the April 25, 1926 issue, and was renewed in 1953.
